name: Admin Simulator
description:
BASEMENT STORIES
Once upon a time, in an old cellar under mommy's house, lived admins.
This story could end at this point, but a moment of carelessness and
all the admins were out of the basement and started spreading around the world...
that's how it all began!



                          LIFE IN A CORPORATION
As a freshly released admin, you need some cash to make a living in this cruel world with no mommy's yummy dinners.
Find your favourite corporation and reveal your super powers!
Solve your co-workers' problems, and decide if they're going to treat you like a friendly dummy, or like the worst enemy.



                        GET TO WORK!
The painter is out of ink, a new system has to be set up, PCs need to be repaired,
and a new powerful machine for your boss is still in parts...
Prove yourself, and show them that all these years in a basement were worth it! Drag cables around like no one ever did!



                        SHOW YOUR DARK SIDE
Your boss underestimates you, and the girl you like ignores you all the time? No worries!
The real "life" starts after dark. Organize illegal poker tournaments in your server room,
and find out about your co-workers' little secrets by monitoring their workday!
Everybody has his stains and every way to get some money is nice... the end justifies the means!
